00010 #ifndef BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_PUT_COMPOSE_CSV_HELD_ER_2010_HPP
00011 #define BOOST_ASSIGN_V2_PUT_COMPOSE_CSV_HELD_ER_2010_HPP
00012 #include <boost/mpl/apply.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/anon/csv/assign_copy.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/fusion/assign_copy.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/assign/v2/ref/wrapper/copy.hpp>
00016 
00017 namespace boost{
00018         struct use_default;
00019 namespace assign{ 
00020 namespace v2{
00021 namespace put_compose_csv_aux{
00022 
00023         template<typename Pars, std::size_t N, typename U>
00024     struct held
00025     {
00026         typedef boost::use_default tag2_;
00027         typedef v2::ref::assign_copy::nth_result_of::fusion<tag2_> meta1_;
00028         typedef typename boost::mpl::apply1<meta1_, Pars>::type pars_cont_type;
00029         typedef typename v2::ref::assign_copy::nth_result_of::csv_anon<
00030                 N,
00031                 U
00032         >::type seq_arg_cont_type;
00033 
00034                 held(){}
00035         held(pars_cont_type const& p, seq_arg_cont_type const& s)
00036                 : pars_cont( p ), seq_arg( s ){}
00037 
00038                 pars_cont_type const& parameters()const
00039         {
00040                 return this->pars_cont;
00041         }
00042 
00043                 seq_arg_cont_type const& sequence_arg()const
00044         {
00045                 return this->seq_arg;
00046         }
00047                 seq_arg_cont_type& sequence_arg()
00048         {
00049                 return this->seq_arg;
00050         }
00051 
00052                 protected:
00053                 pars_cont_type pars_cont;
00054         seq_arg_cont_type seq_arg;
00055     
00056     };
00057 
00058 }// put_compose_csv_aux
00059 }// v2
00060 }// assign
00061 }// boost
00062 
00063 #endif
